name: Portal Brawl
description: Bring your friends over for this four-player couch co-op game. Plug in your controllers and save the universe from Big Bad's golem army. Fight through different realms as Dennis, Zerandi, Revdioc, and Anix. Stop the advancement of the golems and save your worlds from destruction. Revive your teammates by sacrificing a bit of your health. Pick up power-ups to give you an advantage in the fight.
